title: SMART Irrigation - SMART WASH to respond to pandemics

tasks.task: Engage in agricultural policy discussions and vulnerability mapping for food security and public health.
subtasks: Review and contribute to the development of the Smart Irrigation Smart Wash discussion paper.
Assess geographical hotspots of COVID-19 impacts on agriculture, food production, and hygiene.
Analyze risk indicators of food insecurity and health vulnerability for investment categorization.

tasks.task: Propose investment packages for interventions addressing the identified hotspots.
subtasks: Identify on-farm and system-level water conservation technologies for multiple use.
Evaluate the effectiveness of twin-track approaches in enhancing food security and public hygiene.
Consider the role of irrigation potential in expanding water use for agricultural and sanitation purposes.
